amendment.description: At the end of the bill (before the short title), insert the following: Sec. __. The total amount of appropriations made available by this Act is hereby reduced by $181,000,000.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce the total amount of appropriations made by the bill by $181,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 302 (Roll no. 481).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Woolsey amendment (A027) Failed by recorded vote: 114 - 302 (Roll no. 481).
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A027) offered by Ms. Woolsey.
